scripts.csr-dev: yarn csr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=csrdev APP_ROOT=app/web umi dev
scripts.csr-test-build: yarn csr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=csrtest APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.csr-prod-build: yarn csr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=csrprod APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.ssr-dev: yarn ssr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=ssrdev egg-bin dev --port=7001 --sticky
scripts.ssr-local-build: yarn ssr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=ssrlocal APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.ssr-test-build: yarn ssr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=ssrtest APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.ssr-prod-build: yarn ssr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=ssrprod APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.csr-analyze: yarn csr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=csrdev ANALYZE=1 APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.ssr-analyze: yarn ssr2app && cross-env UMI_ENV=ssrprod ANALYZE=1 APP_ROOT=app/web umi build
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run cov
